creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation
medium: Napped wool (rasha), silk, gold and silver thread, brass buttons, silk lining
text: Flamboyant surcoat worn over armor, decorated with a hexagonal pattern along the shoulder made of gold thread and below that hang long, twisted tassels also made of gold thread.
title: Red and green battle surcoat with gold tassels and yellow-ground lining with crests, possibly related to the Inaba clan
